name: Path M
title: Pathologic M
notes: **Note:**  Celiac lymph nodes are classified as distant nodes for TNM 7 staging.  They are coded in distant metastasis.
rows:
Distant lymph nodes:
    Celiac
    Para-aortic 
    Peripancreatic (along body and tail of pancreas only)
    Pericaval

Carcinomatosis

Distant metastasis WITH or WITHOUT distant lymph nodes 

Distant metastasis, NOS

Stated as M1
